means: 夏伊洛（美国田纳西州一国家公园，南北战争时的战场）

sentence.Network_en: So they did in Shiloh unto all the Israelites that came thither.
sentence.Network_cn: 凡上到示罗的以色列人,他们都是这样看待.

sentence.Network_en: They shall all at last be gathered to Shiloh, their glorious Redeemer.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们最后都向夏特洛聚拢, 向他们荣耀的救世主聚拢.

sentence.Network_en: Thus they did in Shiloh to all the Israelites who came there.
sentence.Network_cn: 凡到示罗来的以色列人,他们都是这样对待.
